name: Testing Box
description:
Just a small  project I'm putting together to refresh my unity skillz and learn how to post on itch and stuff. Do not prepare to be entertained, this is just a test project. Submitting for the black and white game jam on the 12th.

I don't plan to continue developing this game until my actual current project is done if at all. Maybe I'll use it in a future project?  probably not
